players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let any mafia infiltrators slip through."
You: "I saw Charlie last night and he seemed fine. I don't think the mafia is involved."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he is the mafioso. We need to be cautious, especially since Charlie was found dead."
Bob: "I'm shocked by the turn of events and I assure you all that I had nothing to do with Charlie's death. Let's focus on finding out who did this heinous act and bring them to justice."
